channel.title: Bow attacking in wild error + bow hit timer off. +HELPZ ME+
channel.description: ok well i got this error when i go in the wild with a bow on devolution (dodian) i cant hit ner my hit timer goes away same with all the other weapons i put hit timers on.... and then when im fighting a npc with a bow it like hits so FAST! helpzor me
